fields.name: Arguments
fields.description: The collection of override arguments to be used when executing this build step.

fields.name: DockerFilePath
fields.description: The Docker file path relative to the source context.

fields.name: ImageNames
fields.description: The fully qualified image names including the repository and tag.

fields.name: IsPushEnabled
fields.description: The value of this property indicates whether the image built should be pushed to the registry or not.

fields.name: NoCache
fields.description: The value of this property indicates whether the image cache is enabled or not.

fields.name: Target
fields.description: The name of the target build stage for the docker build.
